entries.meaning: (Islam) A faqir, owning no personal property and usually living solely off alms.
(Hinduism, more loosely) An ascetic mendicant, especially one who performs feats of endurance or apparent magic.
(derogatory) Someone who takes advantage of the gullible through fakery, especially of a spiritual or religious nature.
examples: He denounces no one until he has all the damaging facts in hand, very frequently backed up with affidavits. He 'Lawsonized' certain stock jobbers and financial fakirs of London before the Boston advertising man was heard of.
